attributes.action: review all mail services now in the control of royal mail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at present i have to walk from our road to a6 main road very busy cross this road walk to now closed post office to post letter like most of our residents i am sixty four others are much older i have a leg problemus a stick others have heart problemsthe next post box app mile and half our only post office is three bus stops then a walk i requst that in the future there are morepost-offices in supermarkets post box outside and a review of royal mail postal services for the future
